org.propelgraph

Interface LocatableGraphFactory


  • public interface LocatableGraphFactory
    Implementations of this interface and the LocatableGraph interface work together to help persist and rehydrate graph objects.
    Author:
    drewvale

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FACTION_CREATE_DIE
      If graph does not exist, create it.
      static String FACTION_CREATE_EMPTY
      If graph doesn't exist, create it.
      static String FACTION_CREATE_OPEN
      If graph does not exist, create it.
      static String FACTION_DIE_OPEN
      If graph doesn't exist, die.
      static String FACTION_NEW_NEW
      If graph doesn't exist, die.
      static String FMODE_ADD
      Open graph for read-add access.
      static String FMODE_READ
      Open graph for read access.
      static String FMODE_WRITE
      Open graph for write access.
      static String SCHEME_PGGRAPH 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getGraphURL(Graph graph)
      This method returns a string that this class would like passed to it's create method in order for the caller to later reinstantiate the graph object.
      Graph open(String urlPath, String faction, String fmode)
      This method creates a LocatableGraph object indicated by the provided urlPath.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        Graph open(String urlPath,
         String faction,
         String fmode)
           throws AlreadyExistsException,
                  NotFoundException,
                  UnsupportedFActionException
        This method creates a LocatableGraph object indicated by the provided urlPath.
        Parameters:
        urlPath -
        faction - - The action to take if the graph doesn't exist or does exist. See the FACTION constants of this interface. If the action is "die", then a AlreadyExistsException or NotFoundException is thrown.
        fmode - - The mode the graph is in once it is opened. See the FMODE_* constants of this interface.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException
        NotFoundException
        UnsupportedFActionException

      • getGraphURL

        String getGraphURL(Graph graph)
        This method returns a string that this class would like passed to it's create method in order for the caller to later reinstantiate the graph object. The calling code needs the returned string to be in a format that will allow the calling code to do an operation like the following to form a url: url = "pggraph:"+classname+urlpath+"?extraparam1=val1&extraparam2=val2" where urlpath includes a leading /.
        Returns:
        The returned url string must comply with the example above.
